definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Moab (cf. Sab. [[נמרן]] attrib. of Barḳm, DHM:ZMG xxix (1875), 592, v. also CIS:iv. No. 103, p. 169; ma0’un namiyrun wholesome water Lane:2853, also We:l. c.);—only [[מֵי נִמְרִים]] Is 15:6, Je 48:34; prob. = Bhnnamareim Lag:Onom. 284:33, in Wady Numêre at SE. end of Dead Sea, Buhl:Geogr. 272.
